org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler

Class LightningEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler.LightningEvent

  • public class LightningEvent
extends JSONParsable
    Object generated by LightningHandler whenever an invoice is added or settled in the underlying lightning node. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-11-24.
